name: Cobra Kai
summary: Thirty years after the events of the 1984 All Valley Karate Tournament, Johnny Lawrence's life has taken a rocky turn as he tries to forget a past that constantly haunts him. He seeks redemption by reopening the infamous Cobra Kai karate dojo. But the LaRusso-Lawrence rivalry of yesteryear is reignited when their lives become intertwined with the next generation of "karate kids".

episodes.name: Ace Degenerate
episodes.summary: In 2018, Johnny Lawrence lives in dreams of the past and how his life was great until Daniel LaRusso beat him in a karate tournament. Now Daniel owns a successful auto group and Johnny gets by on menial jobs. But things change when Johnny sees a teenage boy beat up on by bullies.

episodes.name: Strike First
episodes.summary: Daniel finds out about Johnny's new dojo and realizes that he's lost the balance that he had in the past. Meanwhile, Johnny deals with his own errant son while training Miguel.

episodes.name: Esqueleto
episodes.summary: Johnny starts Miguel's training in earnest while beginning an online promotion of his dojo. Meanwhile, Daniel volunteers to chaperone the school Halloween dance to keep an eye on Samantha but comes face-to-face with a skeleton from his past.

episodes.name: Cobra Kai Never Dies
episodes.summary: Someone defaces Daniel's dealership billboard, and he suspects his rival. Meanwhile, Samantha learns the truth about Kyler, and Johnny has eye-awakening meetings with his son and ex-wife.

episodes.name: Counterbalance
episodes.summary: Daniel schemes to raise the rent on Johnny's dojo, forcing him to leave. Meanwhile, Miguel puts Johnny's training to use, and Robby gets a job after seeing his father with Miguel.

episodes.name: Quiver
episodes.summary: Robby puts up with hazing by Louie, and Daniel takes pity on him. Meanwhile, Johnny discovers that students have changed in the last 30 years and remembers his own childhood.

episodes.name: All Valley
episodes.summary: Johnny and Miguel give each other advice, on getting the ban lifted on Cobra Kai from the All-Valley Tournament and dating Samantha. However, Daniel has something to say about Johnny's attempts to get Cobra Kai in.

episodes.name: Molting
episodes.summary: While training with Daniel, Robby gets closer to Samantha and Miguel notices. Meanwhile, Johnny tries to make amends for his past.

episodes.name: Different But Same
episodes.summary: Amanda forces Daniel to give Johnny a new car to replace the one Louie burned up, and Johnny and Daniel bond over their common upbringings. Meanwhile, Miguel suspects that Samantha is cheating on him with Robby, and Daniel finds out that Robby is Johnny's son.

episodes.name: Mercy
episodes.summary: Cobra Kai fights in the All Valley Karate Championship, and the final match comes down to Miguel and Robby. Each of them put their sensei's lessons to use but only one can emerge the victor. Afterward, Johnny receives a visit from a figure from his past.

episodes.name: Mercy, Part II
episodes.summary: After Miguel wins the championship, an old friend stops by Cobra Kai to congratulate Johnny. Daniel and Robby prepare Miyagi-Do and get a second student.

episodes.name: Back in Black
episodes.summary: Daniel and Johnny both find their own paths to training their students, with Kreese observing Johnny's methods.

episodes.name: Fire and Ice
episodes.summary: Johnny manages to get onto the Internet and sees Daniel's ad for his new dojo. The two dojos choose the local ValleyFest to demonstrate their skills and one-up each other.

episodes.name: The Moment of Truth
episodes.summary: Miguel notices the discrepancies in Kreese's stories and goes to Johnny with his suspicions. Daniel wonders how to bring students to Miyagi-do, and Aisha makes a new friend.

episodes.name: All In
episodes.summary: Johnny advises his students to go all in when attacking, and tries to apply that philosophy to his relationship with Robby. Meanwhile, Demetri has trouble fitting in with Miyagi-do, and Hawk comes after him, while Tory convinces Miguel to come with her on a date.

episodes.name: Take a Right
episodes.summary: Daniel makes a revelation about his past to his students old and new. Johnny goes on a road trip with three old friends, and Kreese teaches the Cobra Kai students his own philosophy.

episodes.name: Lull
episodes.summary: Kreese persuades Johnny to take the Cobra Kai students out for the Coyote Creek challenge. Daniel has trouble balancing his new training responsibilities with his wife and job.

episodes.name: Glory of Love
episodes.summary: When Carmen gets a new boyfriend, Johnny turns to a dating app to meet women. Daniel turns to his mother Lucille for advice when Amanda refuses his attempts to apologize for neglecting her and the business.

episodes.name: Pulpo
episodes.summary: Johnny goes out on a date with Carmen, and they end up at the same restaurant as Daniel and Amanda. Moon tries to bring the two warring dojos together at a party before school starts, but things don't go as plan.

episodes.name: No Mercy
episodes.summary: The two warring faction students meet head-on at West Valley High School on the first day of school, with both sides looking for revenge.

episodes.name: Aftermath
episodes.summary: Miguel's fighting for his life, Robby's missing, and Daniel and Johnny's reputations are in tatters as the community reacts to the West Valley brawl.

episodes.name: Nature Vs. Nurture
episodes.summary: Daniel and Johnny team up to find Robby. Miguel faces an uncertain future. Kreese tries to bring Tory back to Cobra Kai.

episodes.name: Now You're Gonna Pay
episodes.summary: Daniel's tarnished public image takes a toll on his sales, leading to a takeover offer. Johnny tries to raise money for Miguel's surgery.

episodes.name: The Right Path
episodes.summary: Following an important meeting in Japan, Daniel revisits Mr. Miyagi's hometown on Okinawa. Johnny attempts to reconnect with Robby.

episodes.name: Miyagi-Do
episodes.summary: In Okinawa, Daniel spends time with an old friend — and an old enemy, who has much to teach him. The dueling dojos' rivalry comes to a nasty head.

episodes.name: King Cobra
episodes.summary: Miguel helps Johnny craft the perfect social media message. Kreese scouts new recruits while Daniel and Amanda try to shut down Cobra Kai.

episodes.name: Obstáculos
episodes.summary: Daniel spends some father-daughter time with a traumatized Sam. Johnny plans to form a new karate dojo but struggles to come up with a cool name.

episodes.name: The Good, The Bad, and The Badass
episodes.summary: Informed that this year's All Valley Karate Tournament is being canceled, the three competing sensei attend a city council meeting to save it.

episodes.name: Feel The Night
episodes.summary: It's Christmastime in the Valley, and romance is in the air. Daniel and Miguel find unexpected common ground, and the Cobra Kai recruits go on a mission.

episodes.name: December 19
episodes.summary: Old wounds begin to heal at a country club holiday party, but a brutal assault by Kreese's students leads to new betrayals and alliances.

episodes.name: Let's Begin
episodes.summary: Johnny and Daniel combine dojos but their opposing styles immediately clash. Kreese tries to persuade a former partner to rejoin him at Cobra Kai.

episodes.name: First Learn Stand
episodes.summary: Johhny picks up defensive strategies while Daniel learns hot to go on the offensive. Amanda confronts Tory. New kid Kenny is bullied at school.

episodes.name: Then Learn Fly
episodes.summary: Kenny tries to become a student of Cobra Kai with some encouragement from Robby, while Johnny urges Sam to take a leap of faith - in herself.

episodes.name: Bicephaly
episodes.summary: Kreese brings Terry back to Cobra Kai, but his former partner isn't interested in repeating history. Johnny grows envious of Daniel mentoring Miguel.

episodes.name: Match Point
episodes.summary: Johnny and Daniel's dojo — and their fragile alliance — teeter on the brink of collapse when they agree to a winner-takes-all sensei showdown.

episodes.name: Kicks Get Chicks
episodes.summary: A major change to the upcoming tournament sends Johnny scrambling to find a new recruit for Eagle Fang. Tory must ask a favor of the LaRussos.

episodes.name: Minefields
episodes.summary: Daniel invites Anthony to join Miyagi-Do and discovers he doesn't know his son as well as he thought. Miguel learns the truth about Johnny and Carmen.

episodes.name: Party Time
episodes.summary: Miguel and Sam are excited about attending the junior prom until another couple unexpectedly shows up. Terry lures Johnny to a familiar location.

episodes.name: The Fall
episodes.summary: The annual All Valley Karate Tournament kicks off as several competing dojos vie for the grand championship – and settle some personal scores.

episodes.name: The Rise
episodes.summary: The tournament comes to a shocking end, with the aftermath leaving its participants reeling – and two champions facing uncertain futures.
